Content: It's hard to believe that I couldn't see, you were always there beside me. Thought I was alone, with no one to hold, but you were always right beside me. This feeling's like no other. I want you to know, I never had someone, that knows me like you do, the way you do. I've never had someone, as good for me as you, no one like you. So lonely before, I finally found, what I've been looking for.
Source: What I've Been Looking For (High School Musical)
Author: Ashley Tisdale, Lucas Grabeel
